memberdef.name: NK_UTF_SIZE
memberdef.initializer: 4 /* describes the number of bytes a glyph consists of*/

memberdef.name: NK_BOOL
memberdef.initializer: int /* could be char, use int for drop-in replacement backwards compatibility */

memberdef.name: nk_tree_image_push_id
memberdef.initializer: nk_tree_image_push_hashed(ctx, type, img, title, state, NK_FILE_LINE,nk_strlen(NK_FILE_LINE),id)

memberdef.name: nk_tree_element_push_id
memberdef.initializer: nk_tree_element_push_hashed(ctx, type, title, state, sel, NK_FILE_LINE,nk_strlen(NK_FILE_LINE),id)

memberdef.name: NK_CONFIG_STACK
memberdef.initializer: struct nk_config_stack_##type {\ int head;\ struct nk_config_stack_##type##_element elements[size];\ }

memberdef.name: NK_CONTAINS
memberdef.initializer: (NK_INBOX(x,y, bx, by, bw, bh) && NK_INBOX(x+w,y+h, bx, by, bw, bh))
